Package model

Class WordList

java.lang.Object
model.WordList
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable
public class WordList extends Object implements Serializable
WordList stores the list of Wordle words for the run of the program. It gets these words from a words.txt file that contains all of the words in Wordle. Credit to Finn Kunkele for this file. The class also has some utilities related to the list of words, such as checking if the word is in the list. Serialization is needed, but should be implemented in the Puzzle class so that the entire word list's state is saved.
Since:
April 7, 2023

      public WordList()

  • Method Details

    • getPuzzleWord

      public String getPuzzleWord(int seed)
      getPuzzleWord gets a word for the new Wordle puzzle, picking it from the words that have not been used yet. The word is randomly chosen.
      Parameters:
      seed - Integer representing the seed for the random word generator. Used only during testing; should be -1 when not testing.
      Returns:
      String representing the word that will now be the Wordle puzzle.

    • contains

      public boolean contains(String word)
      Determines if the word list contains the given word.
      Parameters:
      word - String representing the word to be found
      Returns:
      boolean representing whether the given word is in the Wordle dictionary. True if it is, false otherwise.

    • getNumberOfUsedWords

      public int getNumberOfUsedWords()
      Returns the number of words that have already been used in a Wordle puzzle, at least since the last time the list of used words was reset. Mostly for testing purposes.
      Returns:
      integer representing the number of words that have already been used in a Wordle puzzle.
